mapper.select: -- retrieveGenTssDcacSmry 개요 조회 SELECT TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , TSS_SMRY_TXT AS tssSmryTxt --과제개요_연구과제배경 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmEffTxt --연구개발성과_파급효과 , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT AS tssSmryDvlpTxt --과제개요_주요연구개발내용 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmTxt --연구개발성과_지재권 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_CTQ_TXT AS rsstDvlpOucmCtqTxt --연구개발성과_CTQ , FNO_PLN_TXT AS fnoPlnTxt --향후 계획 , DCAC_RSON_TXT AS dcacRsonTxt --중단사유 , ATTC_FIL_ID AS attcFilId --첨부파일 , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID AS dcacAttcFilId --첨부파일 , FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt --최초등록일시 , FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId --최초등록자 , LAST_MDFY_DT AS lastMdfyDt --최종수정일시 , LAST_MDFY_ID AS lastMdfyId --최종수정자 FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY /*일반과제개요*/ WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.update: -- updateGenTssDcacSmry 개요 수정 UPDATE IRIS_TSS_GEN_SMRY /*일반과제개요*/ SET TSS_SMRY_TXT = #{tssSmryTxt} --과제개요_연구과제배경 , TSS_SMRY_DVLP_TXT = #{tssSmryDvlpTxt} --과제개요_주요연구개발내용 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmTxt} --연구개발성과_지재권 , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_CTQ_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmCtqTxt} --연구개발성과_CTQ , RSST_DVLP_OUCM_EFF_TXT = #{rsstDvlpOucmEffTxt} --연구개발성과_파급효과 , FNO_PLN_TXT = #{fnoPlnTxt} --향후 계획 , DCAC_RSON_TXT = #{dcacRsonTxt} --중단사유 , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId} --첨부파일 , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.select: -- retrieveGenTssDcacInfo 품의서 정보 조회 SELECT TSS_CD , mbrNmList , plnExp , arslExp , CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) AS createDate FROM (SELECT TSS_CD , STUFF((SELECT DISTINCT ', ' + dbo.fn_getSabunName(SA_SABUN_NEW) FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR as T1 WHERE T1.TSS_CD = T2.TSS_CD FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS mbrNmList FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR T2 WHERE T2.TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} GROUP BY TSS_CD) A , (SELECT SUM(PLN_EXP) AS plnExp , SUM(ARSL_EXP) AS arslExp FROM IRIS_TSS_GEN_TRWI_BUDG_LIST WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} AND YY_MM BETWEEN SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#{tssStrtDd}, '-', ''), 1, 6) AND SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#{tssFnhDd}, '-', ''), 1, 6)) B

-- retrieveGenTssDcacGoalCheck 목표실적 체크 select case when a.arslCnt > 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as chkYn from ( SELECT count(*) as arslCnt FROM IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL /*과제목표_실적*/ WHERE TSS_CD = left(#{tssCd}, 9)+'2' and (convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) = '' or convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) is null) ) a

-- retrieveGenTssDcacItmCheck select case when a.sCnt + b.eCnt = 2 then 'Y' else 'N' end checkItm from ( select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as sCnt from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where del_yn ='N' and ATTC_FIL_ID = ( select ATTC_FIL_ID from IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM where tss_cd = left(#{tssCd}, 9)+'2' and YLD_ITM_TYPE = '01' ) ) a ,( select case when count(*) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as eCnt from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where del_yn ='N' and ATTC_FIL_ID = ( select ATTC_FIL_ID from IRIS_TSS_YLD_ITM where tss_cd = left(#{tssCd}, 9)+'2' and YLD_ITM_TYPE = '03' ) ) b
